venue.name: VIP Tent at Weybosset St. and Westminster St., by TD Bank

item.description:
Just wanted to let you all know about this event going on at Waterfire this Saturday! Tony is hosting this one! This is a fundraiser, so be aware that tickets will be required - see below for more info!

Providence Latin American Film Festival (PLAFF)

Enjoy an open bar with beer, premium wines and VIP treatment.
-Delight your palate with a variety of tasty appetizers.
-Get your groove on with salsa lessons.
-Enjoy an array of mouth watering desserts.

PLAFF is teaming up with WaterFire Providence for a fun night. Turn a typical Providence tradition into a night of entertainment, Latin-Style.

Join us near the Turk's Head Building by the TD Bank stage in downtown Providence for a wonderful outdoor event!

$75 gets you all the above. Plus your ticket is tax-deductible. A win-win. This is a fundraiser for the festival this fall.

Go to: http://plaff.org/?p=574 and grab your ticket! Space is limited to 100 people. No exceptions. Get your ticket today!
item.how_to_find_us: Tony's hosting this one - If you are interested in going, please get your tickets or contact Tony
item.name: This Saturday! WaterFire-PLAFF Salsa Dancing, Open Bar Entertainment!
